DOC.brief_title: Utah Study Evaluating Apneic Oxygenation Emergency Department Intubation
DOC.criteria: Patients require emergent Rapid Sequence Delayed Sequence endotracheal intubation administration neuromuscular blocker ( Succinylcholine , Rocuronium ) Known prisoner Patients cardiac arrest Patients intubate without use neuromuscular blockade ( i.e. , cardiac arrest , awake intubation ) .
